item.title: About me
item.author: leledavid@gmail.com
item.description: Hi there, my name is David and I come from Skopje, Macedonia. I spent some time in Darmstadt, Germany studying maths & computer science (and some more time drinking german beer :-) I got introduced to programming languages through Scheme, and later on Java (but never really made good friends with oop). I’ve always found functional programming constructs much more intuitive and, certain aspects of it quite fascinating (infinite data structures…woow).
